OOC: Cool man. Thanks for doing some leg work.

Kraftlos <kraftlos@...> wrote:          OOC: I just went through about 40 defunct TF/BW RPG yahoogroups and did a bit of advertising.  Maybe we'll get some new members!

------

Hiya, I'm going around to all the old PBEM Transformers/Beastwars RPG's
and trying to see if anyone is still interested in playing. 

NBWRPG is about 8 years old and we're still going strong.
http://games.groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/

Feel free to check out our Wiki if you want more information, the link is on the yahoo groups page listed above.

Thanks!



                         

       
---------------------------------
